The profiler is emitting the timeout as a part of the MonWait event in long format now. Most likely the bug is in MonWaited event, the profiler is emitting the timeout as a part of thisevent in float format now. I'm going to fix timeout attribute emitting in MonWaited event.
Slava - Please have the fix ready. I will request the build to be patched with the fix.
